name: Colourfall (Rover656)
description:
Colourfall - A game of colours and strategy.

IF YOU DIE, ONLY THE START YOU WILL FIND. - Yoda, probably.

Controls:
- A and D or Left and Right = Move left or right
- W or Space or Up = Jump
- Numbers/Numpad numbers = Change to colour (listed on screen).

Colours are gathered from gems spread out across the level. Use these colours to reach the exit door!

Music: http://abstractionmusic.bandcamp.com/
SFX: https://beepyeah.itch.io/8-bit-sfx-pack

Source: https://github.com/Rover656/FNGJ-2020/tree/master/37
